# Installation

## Requirements

- PHP 8.0 or higher
- Composer
- A web server (Apache, Nginx, etc)

## Quick Install

```bash
composer create-project silverstripe/recipe-cms ./my-site
cd my-site
php dev/build
```

## Verification

Open your browser and navigate to your site URL.
